DirList

Lists files of directory with sizes

Functions
filename_convert

Converts 11-character filenames to <name><'.'><ext>.  The result is null-terminated.  The length of the string is returned in ax.

Parameters
si

The address of the source string

di

The address of the destination

Returns
ax

The length of the destination string (without the null-byte)

Modified Registers

si, di, ax, bx, cx
